content:
How can I clone the Isabelle repository? I tried hg clone https://isabelle.in.tum.de/repos/isabelle and I got
abort: error: Connection reset by peer

Mario Xerxes Castelán Castro said:

Also, where are the build instructions?

https://isabelle.in.tum.de/repos/isabelle/file/tip/README_REPOSITORY

Mario Xerxes Castelán Castro said:

How can I clone the Isabelle repository? I tried hg clone https://isabelle.in.tum.de/repos/isabelle and I got
abort: error: Connection reset by peer

Makarius is fighting crawler attacks, he might have broken the repo…
Has Makarius considered using a CDN service?
This one is free and claims to have a free software (FLOSS) version <http://bunkerweb.io/>.
